explanations: I chose this theta because the number of sheep has decreased, making hunting less rewarding. With an increase in the wolf population, competition for food is higher. A moderate intensity allows me to conserve energy while still participating in hunts, increasing my chances of survival without overexerting myself.

I chose this theta because the sheep population has decreased significantly, indicating a scarcity of food. By lowering my hunting intensity, I can conserve energy and avoid competition with other wolves, while still being able to hunt when necessary. This strategy helps ensure my survival in a challenging environment.

I chose this theta because the number of sheep is decreasing, and the competition among wolves is high. By hunting at a moderate intensity, I can conserve energy while still increasing my chances of catching prey. This balance helps ensure my survival without overexerting myself in a challenging environment.
vocalizations: Growwllllllll... times are tough, but I will adapt!
Growwllllllll... times are tough, but I will adapt!
